channel.title: Spoon feed me please
channel.description:

Im NOT a dumbass, I know how to work servers, just not 508's...
Thanks.

item.title: Spoon feed me please
item.dc:creator: @Jordiescape Jordiescape
item.description:
@Jordiescape wrote:

If you’re using palidino76s’ base, replace all the specified batch files with these;.
All.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
RS2.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/*.java pause
RS2.io.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/*.java pause
RS2.io.packets.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/io/packets/*.java pause
RS2.net.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/net/*.java pause
RS2.npcs.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/*.java pause
RS2.npcs.update.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/npcs/update/*.java pause
RS2.players.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/*.java pause
RS2.players.combat.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/combat/*.java pause
RS2.players.items.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/items/*.java pause
RS2.players.update.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/players/update/*.java pause
RS2.util.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/util/*.java pause
RS2.world.items.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/items/*.java pause
RS2.world.mapdata.bat

@echo off cd ../src "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . -d ../bin/ ./palidino76/rs2/world/mapdata/*.java pause
Run.bat

@echo off cd ../bin "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.6.0_07\bin\java.exe" palidino76/rs2/Server 43594 pause

OH SHIT THAT TOOK A WHILE.

Read full topic

item.title: Spoon feed me please
item.dc:creator: @foolet foolet
item.description:
@foolet wrote:

ill describe better
alright im guessing you already have a compiler it just wont work so look for
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” there will be other typeing
it may say jdk1.6.0_0#\bin ect… go to my computer local disk c program files java now look for the highest jdk1.6.0_0# and change ur compiler to that number if this helped r3p me or get one of your friends to if you need more help pm it and we will continue
